ghost

Interface Character

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ambusher, Chaser, Ghost, Ignorant, Waka, Whim

    public interface Character

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkNextMove(Map map)
      Check object next move, if they able to change direction, their direction change.
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Draw character in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset.

      Return Object direction.

      • tick

      • draw

        void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draw character in correct position, for X axis : Xcoordinate * 16 add by their Xpixels add offset, for Y axis : Ycoordinate * 16 add by Ypixels add offset. for ghost draw line if ghost is not in frighten mode
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet object.

      • pixelCheck

        boolean pixelCheck()
        Return true if both yPixels and xPixels is 0, else return false.
        Returns:
        Boolean outcome frome pixel checking.
